title: The Houston House Of Blues Late Show Ft. Z - Ro | Ep. 168
itunes:title: The Houston House Of Blues Late Show Ft. Z - Ro | Ep. 168
description:
The Houston House of Blues Late Show pops off with DC Young Fly, Karlous Miller and Chico Bean showing respect to Houston hip-hop legends and then the crew gets into some amazing hood musical theater making hits like, "Wake up Daddy!" With the band backing them, these stand-up comedians create musical theater about Black pastors, crackheads, and school teachers. You know they always roast the crowd and point out the biggest butts in the audience. The crowd starts reciting Z-Ro and he happened to be hanging out backstage so Karlous brought him out for a live freestlyle! This is the coldest podcast live from the House of Blues Houston! FOLLOW THE CREW KARLOUS MILLER - https://www.facebook.com/karlousm/ DCYOUNGFLY - https://www.facebook.com/DcYoungFly1/ CHICO BEAN - https://www.facebook.com/OldSchoolFool/ BILLY SORRELLS - https://www.facebook.com/billysorrells/ FAT AND PAID - https://www.facebook.com/Fatandpaid/ DARREN BRAND - https://www.facebook.com/darrenbigbab... CLAYTON ENGLISH - http://www.claytonenglish.com/ JOE T. NEWMAN - http://www.ayoungplayer.com CHAD OUBRE - https://www.instagram.com/chadoubre/ LANCE CRAYTON - https://www.instagram.com/cat_queso/ J.O.N - https://www.instagram.com/heeeyj_o_n/ CRIAG GRAVES - https://www.instagram.com/craigshoots23/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
